header.title: TypEr Release Notes

chapter.p: This document describes the changes made to TypEr.

item.p: Fix a bug that could result in a crash when printing warnings onto standard error.
Properly extract annotations from core code.
The name of a compiler option has been fixed in the Makefile.
Added initial documentation framework for TypEr.
